boardgame.name: Mykerinos
boardgame.description: 1899. For more than a century, the European public has been fascinated by Egyptology and the discoveries of Denon, Champollion, Petrie and others. Seeking adventure and glory, teams of archaeologists search the sands of Egypt for hidden treasures._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Mykerinos. Embody archaeologists seeking relics from ancient Egypt for powerful benefactors. Will you be convincing at the museum's final exhibition?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game takes place over four rounds. The game board is composed of four (or six in the last round) areas of two cards. These cards have 6 squares, possibly occupied by an obstacle (pyramid), and belonging to one of five benefactors (with their own color and symbol): Sir Brown, Lady Violet, Miss Blackmore, Lord Lemon and Colonel Tangerine._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each player has their own personal pool of archaeologists that can be used to:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Start an excavation (requiring one archaeologist)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Expand an excavation (requiring two archaeologists in addition to one archaeologist already on the board)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Play a benefactor previously earned_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Pass_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Benefactors give special benefits like moving over an obstacle or retrieving archaeologists faster, etc ..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Once all players have passed, we resolve the board according to area control. The player in the first position can either take a card available or go to the museum. Other players can then do the same. Ties are resolved according to player order._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Going to the Museum adds value for a colour at endgame to the cards collected (x2, x3 or x5)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;At the end of the 4th round, the final exhibition is resolved and the winning player will be whoever collected the most prestige between:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Points on the cards collected during game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Points by colour benefactors (according to position in the museum)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Bonus points for sets of cards (1 in every colour of benefactors)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

2006 International Gamers Awards - General Strategy; Multi-player Nominee
2007 Golden Geek Best Gamer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Board Game Nominee

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Brand New!! Still in shrinkwrap. Will ship internationally. Rio Grande Games (RIO 294)

New release from Rio Grande Games. In shrink copy. This area control game relies on strategy rather than luck. Compares with Web of Power in terms of length and fun factor. A must for any game collection. Dig for lost treasures in the ancient sands of Egypt. As a struggling archeologist, you must find the best artifacts to gain fame and fortune. Who will become the most respected in the field? VA residents pay 5% sales tax.

NEW AND FACTORY FRESH We are a small, family owned and operated game shoppe. Like you, we simply love board games! You_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll only pay $7.99 to have your Mykerinos board/card game shipped via USPS PRIORITY 2-3 DAY MAIL. As always, you may add USPS Insurance for $1.35. Please have a look at our other listings on BoardGameGeek. We now have well over 200, and we_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re still growing! SAVE MONEY: We_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll discount your shipping costs if you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d like to order more than one item. International orders, please inquire about shipping costs through email before ordering. North Dakota residents are responsible for 6% sales tax. Thank you, Jeremy, Jennifer, and Family J and J Board Games
In shrink from Rio Grande Games. VA residents pay 5% sales tax. Estimated shipping in US $6
In great shape, only played twice. Shipping will be $7.00 for priority mail. I accept Paypal.
Played a few times. German edition, but no language-sensitive components, and comes with color printout of English-language rules.

Shipping is EUR 6.00 within Europe or EUR 8.00 worldwide. The delivery time varies from 1 to 4 weeks. I can offer even more games upon request. Please also check listings of my friend montsegur - combined regular shipping is possible. For more details on my USA special shipping offer please click the robbirob button.

Rio Grande Games (RIO 294) Number of players: 2-5 Age of players: 9+ Length: 60 minutes Game Description: 1899. For more than a century, the European public has been fascinated by Egyptology, and the discoveries of Denon, Champollion, Petrie and others.Seeking adventure and glory, teams of archaeologists search the sands of Egypt for hidden treasures.The players embody archaeologists working for patrons. They excavate the land of Egypt to find precious artifacts, which will adorn the most prestigious rooms of the Museum. Author: Nicolas Oury

Shipping is EUR 6.00 within Europe or EUR 8.00 worldwide. The delivery time varies from 1 to 4 weeks. I can offer even more games upon request. Please also check listings of my friend montsegur - combined regular shipping is possible. For more details on my USA special shipping offer please click the robbirob button.
